annonstext:
Lynk&Co Design is part of Geely Design Global, a multi-cultural organization with seven well-equipped studios in Shanghai, Gothenburg, Barcelona, Kuala Lumpur, Coventry, Hethel and FIRSTNAME LASTNAME, with total staff of approximately 900. These design studios, with top class design teams and the latest tools in design development, are responsible for the creation of a unique design language for each of Geely's brands; Geely, Lynk & Co, Proton, Lotus and London Taxi.
We are a fast-growing team of both creative and management professionals with the task of delivering exciting global products suitable for volume production and innovative concepts. In an inspiring studio environment, we build and maintain a top-class design team of multiple nationalities. With best in class processes and tools we challenge preconceptions and deliver premium car design.
In the heart of Sweden's automotive cluster Gothenburg, we have concentrated all our efforts in the creation of the new brand in the Geely family, LYNK & CO, and all of its coming products. LYNK & CO has made its mark by sophisticated design and an appreciation of the connected world we live in. Today we are more than 300 people who work with coming LYNK & CO products.
CEVT is an innovation center for the future cars of the Geely Group, developing mobility solutions for a different tomorrow.

As an Exterior Studio Design Engineer, you are an active link between Design and Engineering departments. You are also providing internal support to the Design department regarding technical and legislative constraints and opportunities.
This is a truly cross functional role where you will be the voice of design, communicating design intents and need to Engineering in an international environment. Based in Lindholmen, Gothenburg, you will be contributing to realizing design themes from sketch into production.
To thrive in this role, we believe you are an experienced engineer with a passion for Creative Automotive Design and an ability to drive, motivate and convince, using all your mediating skills. We also believe you need to be a true team player and have an ability to take a leading role as well as to work independently. International travels will be needed.

Main focus in your role

- Being the internal Engineering support within Design, engineer feasible solutions to support design intent.
- Managing and documenting agreements between Design and Engineering, mediate and drive compromises within your area.
- Translating engineering and legislative requirements into design possibilities.
- Understand and implement technical input and limitations in the design models.
- Manage and drive interface meetings between Design and Engineering.
- Document feasibility of design themes and raise critical issues.
- Help setting up and support clay model development.

Qualifications and key attributes

- B.Sc., M.Sc. Eng or equivalent, +7 years solid relevant working experience.
- Strong communication skills.
- Deep complete vehicle Engineering knowledge.
- Automotive product concept and component design experience on aesthetically sensitive areas.
- Catia and Teamcenter experience.
- Cultural awareness, especially Asian - European culture.

For more information please contact:

FIRSTNAME LASTNAME, Senior Manager PMO & Studio Engineering,  TELEPHONENO for questions regarding the position.

FIRSTNAME LASTNAME Djokovic, Senior Recruiter,  TELEPHONENO , for questions regarding the recruitment  process.

Last Application date: 2021-03-28

Apply today. We will perform ongoing selection during the application period. We look forward to hearing from you.

Working at Lynk & Co Design

We are engineers, developers and innovators from around the world. Joined together by entrepreneurship, our unique blend of Chinese and Scandinavian culture and a belief in a smarter more sustainable future.

- Supportive and creative work environment
- 30 days of vacation and additional 8 days paid ATK- days annually
- Great office location at Lindholmen Science Park
